triples.evidence: how light can be used to visualize and analyze biological structures and functions

evidence: Optical imaging combines fascinating principles from physics, biology, and engineering
By learning how these ideas connect, you'll develop a deep intuition for the topic
Enjoy the journey, stay engaged, and you'll come away with a clear picture of how optical imaging works and why it plays such an important role in modern biomedical imaging

concepts.term: why it plays such an important role in modern biomedical imaging

evidence: This topic isn’t included in the green textbook, so this lecture stands alone.
Optical imaging combines fascinating principles from physics, biology, and engineering, and by learning how these ideas connect, you’ll develop a deep intuition for the topic.
